params.retrieval_query:
RETURN node {.text, .name, .description} AS startNode, 
       NULL AS relationship, 
       NULL AS endNode
UNION
OPTIONAL MATCH (e:`__Entity__`)-[:FROM_CHUNK]->(node)
WITH [
    (e)-[r]-(other:__Entity__) | 
    CASE 
        WHEN startNode(r) = e THEN [e, type(r), other] 
        ELSE [other, type(r), e] 
    END
] AS contextRels
UNWIND contextRels AS context
WITH context[0] AS startNode, 
     context[1] AS relationship, 
     context[2] AS endNode
WHERE startNode IS NOT NULL
  AND relationship IS NOT NULL
  AND endNode IS NOT NULL
WITH DISTINCT startNode, relationship, endNode
with startNode, relationship, endNode
return startNode {.text, .name, .description} as startNode, relationship as relationship, endNode {.text, .name, .description} as endNode
